title: Add custom domain/URL configuration for the live Meta Lottery Portal

requirements.text: Add a configuration interface or documentation to enable custom domain mapping for the deployed canister URL (https://iwwkn-jyaaa-aaaap-qnc6q-cai.icp0.io), allowing the user to configure a vanity URL or custom domain for the Meta Lottery Portal.

quotes: Can you help me re customize my url in my own way pls

acceptanceCriteria: User can configure a custom domain or vanity URL for the canister
Instructions or UI elements guide the user through domain configuration steps
The custom URL mapping works without breaking Internet Identity authentication
Documentation includes any necessary DNS or canister configuration steps

constraints: Do not change the backend main.mo actor structure
Maintain existing frontend immutable paths (useInternetIdentity.ts, useActor.ts, main.tsx, components/ui)
nonGoals: Creating a full domain registrar integration
Modifying the Internet Computer canister ID itself
